newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Deutsche Morgan cuts copper cos.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Deutsche Morgan cuts copper cos.

text.p: Deutsche Morgan Grenfell said it downgraded several copper companies.
-- cut ASARCO Inc to hold from buy.

-- said earnings comparisons should be negative for ASARCO throughout 1998; believes ASARCO is fairly priced at 30-5/8; said ASARCO's earnings are the most sensitive to changes in the price of copper.
-- cut Cyprus Amax Mineral Co to hold from accumulate.
-- believes Cyprus Amax is fairly priced at 25-3/8.
-- cut Phelps Dodge Corp to accumulate from buy.
-- expects Phelps Dodge earnings comparisons to be negative in 1998 as the copper price comes down.
-- believes Phelps Dodge is near fairly priced at 88-1/2.
-- reiterated buy rating on Freeport-McMoRan Copper & Gold Inc.
